Package org.hkijena.acaq5.api.parameters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ACAQCustomParameterCollection
    If a class inherits from this interface, reflection-based parameter discovery is replaced by the getCustomParameters() method result.
    ACAQNamedParameterCollection
    An ACAQParameterCollection that comes with a predefined name
    ACAQParameterAccess
    Interface around accessing a parameter
    ACAQParameterCollection
    Interfaced for a parameterized object
    ACAQParameterTypeDeclaration
    A type that describes an ACAQ parameter type
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACAQDefaultParameterTypeDeclaration
    Standard implementation of ACAQParameterTypeDeclaration
    ACAQDummyParameterCollection
    An ACAQParameterCollection that stores exactly one value (an object) This is used in conjunction with ACAQManualParameterAccess
    ACAQDynamicParameterCollection
    Holds a user-definable set of parameters
    ACAQDynamicParameterCollection.UserParameterDefinition
    Parameter definition by a user
    ACAQManualParameterAccess
    A custom parameter access
    ACAQManualParameterAccess.Builder
    A builder for ACAQManualParameterAccess
    ACAQMutableParameterAccess
    A mutable implementation of ACAQParameterAccess
    ACAQMutableParameterAccess.Deserializer
    Deserializes ACAQMutableParameterAccess
    ACAQParameterCollectionVisibilities
    Used as parameter to control the visibility of an existing parameter collection
    ACAQParameterTree
    An ACAQParameterCollection that contains all the parameters of one or multiple ACAQParameterCollection instances in a traversed form.
    ACAQParameterTree.Node
    A node
    ACAQReflectionParameterAccess
    ACAQParameterAccess generated from reflection
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ACAQParameterVisibility
    Defines the visibility of a parameter
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ACAQParameter
    Annotates a getter or setter function as parameter.
